Competitions.name: The Engineer’s Monopoly
Competitions.description: A fusion of monetary dealings and challenging tasks...
Competitions.detailedDescription: A fusion of monetary dealings and challenging tasks followed by building a hands-on assembly in limited time.

Competitions.name: TrailBlazers
Competitions.description: Event in which one partner navigates through...
Competitions.detailedDescription: Event in which one partner navigates through hurdles with the help of another partner without using the conventional directional words, instead using code words for directions.

Competitions.name: Battle Royale Brawl (E-Sports Event) : CODM
Competitions.description: Gear up for an electrifying inter-college E-sports...
Competitions.detailedDescription: Gear up for an electrifying inter-college E-sports extravaganza! Dive into the adrenaline-fueled action of our E-sports event featuring intense battles in Fall Guys and tactical warfare in Call of Duty Mobile(CODM). Race through virtual playgrounds, hurdle obstacles, and engage in tactical warfare for a chance to claim glory!

Competitions.detailedDescription: Gear up for an electrifying inter-college E-sports extravaganza! Competitions.name: TradeTrek
Competitions.description: TradeTrek is an import-export game especially curated for ...
Competitions.detailedDescription: TradeTrek is an import-export game especially curated for international relations enthusiasts, where teams represent a country and trade resources to move towards a goal whilst strategizing about their country’s balance of payments.

Competitions.name: TechnoVoyage:The Venusian Explorer
Competitions.description: Teams have to build an autonomous robot which can follow a white line on a black background and complete ...
Competitions.detailedDescription: This is 1v1 robot controlling game, where players compete against each other to help the Shukrayaan reach its destination. There will be various obstacles in the path of the robot representing different stages of the Shukrayaan. The person who completes the task with the most points WINS!!(On the Spot Registration)

Competitions.name: Mozilla Village
Competitions.description: At the entrance, the individual participant or the duo has to choose any one chit out of the bowl...
Competitions.detailedDescription: At the entrance, the individual participant or the duo has to choose any one chit out of the bowl of chits. Each chit will contain permutations of any 4 games out of 6 total games.(On the spot registrations)

Competitions.name: ARong US
Competitions.description: An offline social deduction game inspired by 'Among Us', where players...
Competitions.detailedDescription: An offline social deduction game inspired by 'Among Us', where players complete AR tasks while imposters try to sabotage and eliminate crewmates, all on your mobile phones
